name: Ocean Pressure
description:
Ocean Pressure is a short horror game where you as an old scientist piloting your handmade submarine in the bottom of the ocean. Your mission is explore the ocean and collect required data with help of your submarine.

WILL YOU SURVIVE?

  • Explore:
    Explore the depths of the ocean in your handmade submarine. Using your sonar find unique locations and do the research you need. Scanner will help you gather all required data.
  • Challenging gameplay:
    During your mission, your submarine may break down or catch fire. Your submarine has a pipe wrench and a fire extinguisher. I hope you know how to use them. Be ready to fix it quickly, otherwise...

THE GAMEPLAY

Claustrophobia will be with you throughout your journey. Find key locations with the sonar and explore them with the scanner. The scanner gives a high quality picture of the outside of the submarine and has a laser to gather information about the underwater fauna. Move with caution, it reacts to movement.

You built this boat with your own hands. When building your submarine, you were inspired by popular submarines. Your submarine has the latest systems and a large porthole. All systems are thoroughly tested, but sometimes they can break down. Use your repair skills and don't drown.

THE STORY

All your life you have been exploring the ocean and have always dreamed of building a small submarine to explore it. As the years went by, you marked on the map the underwater locations you were interested in. Having saved up the money necessary for construction and with the help of your drawings you have assembled your submarine. Almost without testing it you went to the bottom of the ocean to meet your dream.

USING YOUR SONAR FIND LOCATIONS, SCAN THEM AND MOVE TO ANOTHER ONE

Developed by one person.
